text.content:
Based on material Â©2012 Goodman Games, used with permission.

Contains some icon art from game-icons.net and Fantasy Clip Inks (licensed by Tim L. White).

Note that this system does not contain content from copyrighted DCC products, only rollable character sheets.

You can purchase modules containing copyrighted Goodman Games content ready for out-of-the-box use in Foundry VTT from the Goodman Games Web Store.

The online user guide for this system can be found here.

Join us on the FoundryVTT Discord on the #dcc channel to chat and get help.

Maintainers

  • Steve Barnett (@mooped)
  • Christian Ovsenik (@algnc)
  • Tim L. White (@TimLWhite, @cyface, tim@cyface.com)
